channel.title: DerpScape V1 | Torva | Pernix | Virtus | Barrows | Bosses | AND MUCH MORE
channel.description:
---------------INFO--------------- This Includes Alot Of Features Like Barrows Nex Armour Primal All Dung Armour Bosses Minigames Shops Pk Point System Level Point System AND THERE WILL BE PLENTY MORE IN THE PICS! ---------------------------------------------- I DIDNT KNOW HOW TO PUT PICS ON HERE DIRECTLY SO I UPLOADED LINKS INSTEAD! ---------SHOPS-------------- Combat Shop! http://prntscr.com/ovoj9 Range Shop! http://prntscr.com/ovolm Mage Shop! http://prntscr.com/ovoxa SkillCape Shop! http://prntscr.com/ovp0y Level Point Shop! http://prntscr.com/ovp2o Rare Shop! (ITS DUMB) http://prntscr.com/ovp4o ------------------PLACES------------------------------ Donator Zone! AND MORE PLACES U MAY WNA FIND/Staffzone! ----------DOWNLOADS---------- Source: http://up.ht/13oDFNo Client : http://up.ht/13oEoxY
PLEASE IF THERE ARE ANY PROBLEMS PC ME! (BTW ECONOMY RESET DOENST WORK!)
Have Fun! :D :D :D :D :D :eek: :cool:
